name: clinical_trials_search
description: Searches for clinical trials on ClinicalTrials.gov using conditions and/or interventions as filters. Retrieve a list of trials matching the criteria.

action.description: The specific action to perform. Must be set to 'search_studies'.

condition.description: The disease or condition to search for (e.g., 'breast cancer', 'diabetes'). Use this to find trials related to specific health issues.

intervention.description: The drug, treatment, or intervention to search for (e.g., 'pembrolizumab', 'cognitive behavioral therapy'). Use this to find trials testing specific treatments.

limit.description: The maximum number of study summaries to return. The default is 10. Adjust this limit to control the number of results.

return_schema.description: A dictionary containing the search results, including a list of matching clinical trial summaries.

studies.description: A list of summarized study objects, each containing the NCT ID, title, status, and related conditions.

nctId.description: The unique National Clinical Trial identifier (NCT ID) for the study.

title.description: The official or brief title of the clinical trial.

status.description: The current recruitment status of the trial (e.g., 'Recruiting', 'Completed').

conditions.description: A list of conditions or diseases studied in the trial.

name: clinical_trials_get_details
description: Retrieves comprehensive details about a specific clinical trial using its NCT ID.

action.description: The specific action to perform. Must be set to 'get_study_details'.

nct_id.description: The unique NCT identifier of the study to retrieve (e.g., 'NCT05033756'). This ID is required.

return_schema.description: A dictionary containing detailed information about the clinical trial.

nctId.description: The unique National Clinical Trial identifier.

title.description: The official title of the study.

summary.description: A brief summary description of the study protocol and objectives.

eligibility.description: A dictionary containing eligibility criteria, including inclusion and exclusion criteria, gender, and age limits.
